welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chevy Chase, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, upscale shopping, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the hub for all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A is primarily used by American Airlines and its partner airlines for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C is the largest terminal at the airport and serves a variety of domestic and international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines and features a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves a variety of airlines and offers a variety of amenities including a spa and a children's play area.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
